subject: Re: [junit] About Failing Tests and Stopping
msgSnippet: ... As part of the design of JUnit, a test fails right after its first assertion fails. See _JUnit Recipes_, recipe 8.5 for details. Get your copy at your
messageBody:
love wrote:

> When My tsts fail, The tests Stop.
> How can I resume tests until Completion
> even if some Tests fail.Otherwise it stops at the failed test.

As part of the design of JUnit, a test fails right after its first
assertion fails. See _JUnit Recipes_, recipe 8.5 for details. Get your
copy at your local online bookstore.

Take care.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
